body:
This change implements a batch of micro-UX and accessibility improvements (Palette Persona). It standardizes design tokens for shadows and focus states, improves typography rendering, ensures accessible contrast in dark mode, and enhances touch targets. No backend logic was modified. All UI changes were verified via Playwright screenshots using static HTML generation.
